name: Heavenly Ghost
description:
This is a story of man who was an assassin when he was alive. During his last mission he died trying to save an 8 years old girl. 

He woke up in the afterlife facing judgement, though he was a killer he was shown mercy, but he has to fight for his redemption .

In the game you are a ghost who will be fighting against other evil corrupted ghost. And also watch out for the the rising stream of lava.

Your Goal is to destroy all the portals that summons the evil ghost in hell who are trying to destroy everything.

Good luck!

SUPORT THE GAME
